Package Controllers

Class MainFormController

java.lang.Object
Controllers.MainFormController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainFormController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the main form that the user will initially land on when starting the application. Provides the functions of adding/modifying/deleting a part or product.
Author:
Jae Jee

    • partsDelete

      private void partsDelete(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This button method allows the user to delete an existing part. There will also be a confirmation required before the part is deleted.
      Parameters:
      event - The event of the user clicking the button.

    • partsSearch

      public void partsSearch(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
      This method dynamically searches for a part through the text box either by partial match of the name or match of the id. Will replace all entries with those that match the search criteria. Will display all entries if the text box is empty.
      Parameters:
      event - The event of the user typing either letter or number.

    • productsAdd

    • productsDelete

      private void productsDelete(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This button method allows the user to delete an existing product. There will also be a confirmation required before the part is deleted.

      event - The event of the user clicking the button.
